comments:
After importing an ear that has EJB jars,  I tried creating an xdoctlet session bean within an existing EJB project that had beans previously.


I got this exception after the xdoclet build, and tried selecting the DD node in the nav.

*** Bug 134236 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
I hit a similar error when trying to Create an XDocket EJB within a new EJB project.
This should be fixed in any build after Eclipse 3.2 0413. I doubt this will make it into 3.2RC1, but it should be available in 3.2RC2.
Fixed by platform for WTP 1.5 RC2.
